attributes.action: Close our schools to stop our children getting this deadly coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details:
CLOSE ALL SCHOOL TO PROTECT OUR CHILDREN FROM THE CORONAVIRUS.

I thinking of pulling my kids from school due to this coronavirus it started spread from groups of people and started to now get closer to our locations. School are a large gathering with lots of children and teachers I feel that it is not safe and fair to send our kids to school to get ill no parent what's to see their child ill or to die from this virus we can protect our children from this virus. We would protect our child from danger and harm so why should we not protect our children from the deadly virus.
attributes.background: Close our schools to protect our children from this deadly coronavirus.
